banner.title: Sample Data Active
banner.description: This workspace contains sample data from the "{{templateName}}" template.
banner.descriptionMultiple: This workspace contains sample data from {{count}} templates.

emptyState.title: Get Started with Sample Data
emptyState.description: Explore the platform with realistic sample dossiers, relationships, and events. Choose a theme that matches your interests.
emptyState.hint: Sample data can be removed at any time with a single click.

templates.title: Choose a Template
templates.description: Select a themed template to populate your workspace with realistic sample data.

tradeRelations.name: Trade Relations
tradeRelations.description: Bilateral trade agreements, economic partnerships, and commercial diplomacy

culturalExchange.name: Cultural Exchange
culturalExchange.description: Cultural diplomacy, educational partnerships, and heritage preservation

securityCooperation.name: Security Cooperation
securityCooperation.description: Defense agreements, regional stability initiatives, and allied partnerships

diplomaticRelations.name: Diplomatic Relations
diplomaticRelations.description: Embassies, consulates, bilateral agreements, and international organizations

dialog.populateDescription: This will create {{dossierCount}} dossiers, {{relationshipCount}} relationships, and {{eventCount}} events based on the "{{templateName}}" template.
dialog.removeDescription: This will permanently remove all sample data including {{dossierCount}} dossiers, {{relationshipCount}} relationships, {{eventCount}} events, and {{contactCount}} contacts.

notifications.populateSuccess: Sample data populated successfully! You now have {{dossierCount}} sample dossiers to explore.
notifications.populateError: Failed to populate sample data. Please try again.
notifications.removeError: Failed to remove sample data. Please try again.
